homeSubtitle: Your secure and anonymous platform for reporting incidents and promoting accountability. Together, we can build a safer community.
featuresSubtitle: Equilink is designed with your safety and privacy in mind. Here's what makes us different.
feature1Text: Submit reports without revealing your identity. We are committed to protecting your privacy.
feature2Text: Our dashboard provides a transparent view of the reported incidents, helping to identify patterns and drive change.
howItWorksSubtitle: A simple, three-step process to make your voice heard.
step1Text: Navigate to the report submission page from anywhere on the site.
step2Text: Provide the necessary details about the incident. The more information you provide, the better we can address it.
step3Text: Your report is submitted securely and anonymously. You can track the status of reports on the dashboard.
ctaSubtitle: Submit your report today and help us build a safer community.
reportsSynced: All queued reports have been synced.
privacyMessage: Your privacy and security are our top priorities.
